title: Easy Hi-Q Recorder v2.2
description:
Easy Hi-Q Recorder v2.2

Recording software to record streaming audio, Internet radio,         
webcasts, music, convert LP&#039;s, records, tapes and a lot more. It      
will record anything you can hear! It can also be used as podcast     
software to create podcasting ready audio content.                    
                                                                        
Easy Hi-Q Recorder is so easy to use, all you have to do to is        
click Record to get started!                                          
It&#039;s the easiest way to record absolutely any sound in real-time!     
Record directly to: MP3, (Constant Bitrate: CBR or Variable           
Bitrate: VBR), WMA 9, (Windows Media Audio 9), WAV or OGG Vorbis.     
At the high-end you can record to above CD quality 48 kHz stereo      
and at the low-end you can record all the way down to 8 kHz mono.        
There is a very wide range of MP3 Bitrates, also for WMA, from 5      
to 320 Kbps. The quality is excellent at all settings! Record         
streaming Internet audio or video broadcasts or webcasts of any       
kind, whether it&#039;s news, sports, music, talk radio or any other       
format, (records audio only). Record audio or video sounds from       
DVD, Windows Media Player, RealOne Player, Winamp, QuickTime or       
any other media player, games, Midi, Software synthesizer, etc.       
Convert, (record), LP&#039;s, any records, tapes, CD&#039;s, radio, DAT,        
Mini-Disc, video tape sounds, T.V. sounds, video games, telephone,    
microphone or from any other external device. You can also use it     
as a universal audio or video sound file converter.                   
                                                                          
There is also a built-in VCR-like timer so you&#039;ll never miss one      
of your favorite broadcasts again! You can set it to record once,     
daily or weekly. Easy Hi-Q Recorder also includes some advanced           
new features such as sound or voice activation that can               
automatically create new files for each new song or sound             
detected, silence detection and removal, file splitting and more!     
It also has a versatile player. Easy Hi-Q Recorder is easy enough     
for any beginner to use, yet is loaded with powerful, high-quality    
features that will satisfy advanced and professional user&#039;s           
recording needs. Automatic file naming is just one of many            
features that make it so easy to use!                                 
                                                                          
Record and save music that is ready to transfer to your Apple         
iPod, Rio, iRiver, Sony or any other portable MP3 music player!       
WMA, OGG and WAV are also supported in many portable players.         
                                                                          
Create your own iPod iTunes podcast audio content. You&#039;ll be          
podcasting in no time!   

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Extract all files with latest Winrar or 7zip.
Install 
Generate yourself a serial from the Keygen.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

PLEASE SEED WHEN YOU FINISH THE DOWNLOAD.

Enjoy!!
